definition: existing only in the mind, a concept or idea not associated with any specific instance, to consider apart from a particular case or instance
details:
adjective
- existing only in the mind
- dealing with a subject in the abstract without practical purpose or intention
= example: dealing with a subject in the abstract without practical purpose or intention
- not representing or imitating external reality or the objects of nature
= example: not representing or imitating external reality or the objects of nature
= synonyms: abstractionist, nonfigurative, nonobjective
noun
- a concept or idea not associated with any specific instance
= example: a concept or idea not associated with any specific instance
= synonyms: abstraction
- a sketchy summary of the main points of an argument or theory
= synonyms: outline, synopsis, precis
verb
- to consider apart from a particular case or instance
= example: to consider apart from a particular case or instance
- to give a summary of the main points of
= example: to give a summary of the main points of
- to make off with belongings of others
= example: to make off with belongings of others
= synonyms: pinch
